levelledPara.title: Purpose
levelledPara.para: The datum reference set defines the geometric alignment of the center fuselage body. It ensures consistent positioning of structural components and sensor payloads relative to the aircraft coordinate system.

levelledPara.title: Reference Planes
levelledPara.para: The set includes three primary planes: Fuselage Station (FS), Buttock Line (BL), and Water Line (WL). FS350 is the origin for longitudinal alignment of the BH-STA350 bulkhead and Frame C0.

levelledPara.title: Application
levelledPara.para: All subsubsystems within 53-10_CENTER-BODY are indexed to this datum set. Fastener patterns, firewall layers, and sensor mounts use these planes for installation and verification.

levelledPara.title: Compliance
levelledPara.para: The datum system conforms to ISO 5459 and ASME Y14.5 for geometric tolerancing and coordinate referencing. It is validated under the BH-STA350_SKEL_VALIDATED badge.
